overview: A woman marries a gambler with the hopes of reforming him, but things don't quite work out the way she planned.
tagline: Love's no gamble...the way she plays! But he's got a system all his own...for winning her heart! You'll love Robert Young, Barbara Hale and Frank Morgan in gay, wide-open Las Vegas, in RKO's romantic comedy hit LADY LUCK
title: Lady Luck
